name: MAGIC OF THE GOBLIN
description:
Story

   One night while a Magician fell a sleep. 

   The Goblin stole his important stuff. 

   But the spirit of that thing had awakened the Magician. He woke up and found that the item was missing. 

    Only the goblin's magic circle left. So he went into that magic circle to get the items back.

How to play

Control

  • Press A S W D key for walk , Left-click for shoot
  • Walk to the item to collect it.

Rule

  • In your house, there is a magic circle that you have to walk into.
  • There are 3 stages in total. There are 3 stages in total, the first stage, the second stage, and the last boss stage.
  • In stages one and two, you only have 10 lives, if you get hit 10 times the game is over.
  • You will need to cast a spell to kill the goblins and collect all of the Items. To pass to the next level
  • Boss stage, you will have 10 lives and must not be attacked by the boss and minions. You will have to dodge attacks and defeat bosses. To get the item back and the game will end.

Credits:
